Condition: reservation required before coming by contacting him by WhatsApp or call (he speaks French well) or email. Remote place of civilization but super quiet. Barbecue also available and even wild boar visit in the evening :-)

description: Covered parking under a little-traveled road. Ideal for bad weather days in winter and for sunny days in summer. There are many services nearby (CAP, library, supermarkets, laundries, parks, fountains, etc.), further on there is a path where you can walk with animals.

title: (08735) Vilobí del Penedès - 74 Carrer Guixeres de Baix
title_short: (08735) Vilobí del Penedès - 74 Carrer Guixeres de Baix
description: ESP - Public space in a beautiful village of Penedès, from which walking and cycling routes are offered, wine tours and having a unique natural area called Parc dels Talls. This was formed in an old plaster which naturally became a set of lagoons. The area, which is part of the RV Penedès network, along with 11 other areas, is free of drinking water supply and gray and black water drainage. 12 points that bring you closer to the essence of Penedès.

title: (08777) Sant Quintí de Mediona - 52 Carrer del Sol de la Vila
title_short: (08777) Sant Quintí de Mediona - 52 Carrer del Sol de la Vila
description: RV PENEDES AREA - Sant Quintí de Mediona [ESP] Public area a quiet village of Penedès. The old town offers a very pleasant walk. Les Deus, is a natural corner where there are springs of water, a visitable grotto, an adventure park and a restaurant bar. From the front there are routes to do on foot or by mountain bike, the Camí del riu stands out. It also has a very interesting festive heritage: Carnivals, Fiesta Mayor or the Matadegolla fair. The area, which is part of the RV Penedès network, along with 11 other areas, is free with potable water supply and gray and black water drainage. 12 points that bring you closer to the essence of Penedès.

address.street: 52 Carrer del Sol de la Vila

name: Les Valls Bessones
title: (08736) Les Valls Bessones
description: Set amidst rural bliss,PHONE AHEAD re availability....Surrounded by vineyards with majestic views and no neighbours pleasant walks,You will find three hectares of paradise. Our land is located near Guardiola de Font-Rubi, about 45 minutes by car from Barcelona. A quiet place where you can retreat and find total relaxation. We are currently still under construction, but we offer a beautiful natural place where you can meet.we are growing veg/ small holding There will soon be swimming pool on site which will soon be operating on a fully ecological system where the water is filtered by plants, without the use of chemicals. We plan to finish this year . care must be taken with children / dog we have sheep and chickens and work in progress, Bonfires are possible (season permitting).

title: (08734) Moja - 3 Carrer de l'Era

title: (08818) Olivella -

title: (08818) Olivella -
description: early December. close to a small road accessible to all except large cc, my van is 6.30m it was good. in a magnificent natural park. place flat in the back of the parking lot below the observatory but without indication, there is a small water reserve basin. I stayed there 3 nights without worry, but discreet. very little traffic. Calm night with sea view and sunset. 4g networks ok.

title: (08786) Capellades - 38 Ronda Capelló
description: Municipal service area for motorhomes with 4 places, in part of the public car park, 5 minutes walk from the center. Free filling and emptying of gray and black water. Straight but sandy ground. To access one of the places, you must notify the local police. Starting point for an excursion on the route of the Neanderthals and visit of the city.

title: (08630) Abrera - 3 Carrer Joan Miró
description: Free public parking day and night belongs to the Catalan railways for its customers, but the use is free for anyone, it has no barriers. A good decision if you intend to visit the mythical mountain of Montserrat and its surroundings, since the parking in Montserrat is quite expensive.

title: (08786) Capellades - 38 Ronda Capelló
description: Public ground parking, quiet, usually there are cars. Gardens and fountain nearby.

title: (08818) Olivella - Unnamed Road
description: Totally beautiful view, right on the roadside, which is totally quiet at night. Perfect backdrop for a hammock and sunset. Not for very large cars, but there is room for campers in a relaxed manner.

title: (08734) Barcelona -
description: Beautiful place to park there is a closed sign from 11pm to 8am.

title: (08640) Olesa de Montserrat - Junto al rio Llobregat
title_short: (08640) Olesa de Montserrat - Junto al rio Llobregat
description: 12 covered barbecues and water, parking for several caravans, DO NOT PASS THE NIGHT it's floodplain by the river llobregat. It is better to go on weekdays, the weekends are very busy. Beside this place, they are preparing an area to keep the huge motorhomes about 200.

title: (08640) Olesa de Montserrat - Unnamed Road

title: (08734) Barcelona - C-15z

title_short: (08756) La Palma de Cervelló - 25 Carrer Sant Jordi

title: (08740) Barcelona -
description: Free parking day and night. Perfect for going on the metro into the city. There are no time restrictions. We slept for one night and left our van for a whole day to visit Barcelona. The area is safe and clean. There is parallel parking as well as parking bays. We were able to parallel park on the road. There is noise around 7am due to the rush hour but any other time is pretty quiet.

title: (08292) Esparreguera - Carrer del Tallaferro
description: Quiet place to spend the night, close to the motorway exit, but you don't hear it. It is located between a forest and an industrial area. Our night from Saturday to Sunday was very quiet with no noise, but during the week I don't know if there is noise at night. Ideal place to make a stopover if you want to continue the next day.

It is reached by the road that goes up to the institute, then turns into a dirt road that narrows in some places. There are areas where there is only room for one vehicle and areas with a slope. Be careful as there are parts of the road that are not easy with large vehicles, but it is worth going. At Font de les Rovires there is a natural water spring, waterfalls and a picnic table in a beautiful natural setting.

title: (08780) Pallejà -
description: Parking at the entrance to the font de les rovires from the bottom. In the middle of the forest. there are some almost flat spaces to park and with shade. It is at the end of a dead end road. if there are more vehicles it can be difficult to maneuver to turn around, so it is advisable to park facing the exit of the road. It is accessed from the cemetery by a dirt road. At the beginning it has a slight slope, some ruts and some stones, but later it is flat and wide, very easy to drive with large vehicles. In the last section there is a slope and a curve to the left. Then it is to follow the path one more minute to the end. area frequented by hikers.

A little further up the path there is a fountain where you can drink or fill 1.5l bottles of water. Due to the type of trickle source, I don't think they can fill bottles. If you feel like it, you can pay to enter the indoor pool or the summer pool.

It is a quiet place, although it is close to the train tracks and highways, so during the day there is some noise. It does not have services but it does have garbage containers. It is an ideal place to stop. I have confirmed by calling the local police that AC and camper can park here.
